bike.description: Lightweight 6061 aluminum, low standover MX-Moto frame design, includes chainguard and kickstand

components.description: Tubular unicrown, MX Hi-Ten, 28.6 straight blades
Alloy 36H black anodized rims with brushed brake tracks, steel front and Hi-Stop coaster brake rear hubs, 14G nickel-plated spokes
Cold-forged steel, electro-plated black finish, 5 1/2" arms, 36T chainring
BMX style, 8D sweep x 125mm rise x 580mm wide with safety bell
BMX alloy with front facing removable cap, 150mm quill
Alloy linear pull type and Hi-stop coaster brake (both rear only) with alloy lever
